articles.title: ‘It Really Can’t Get Much Worse’: Thousand Oaks, First Hit by Shooting, Now Faces Fire
articles.description: As wildfires spread through Ventura County, thousands of residents were forced to evacuate, including some who had survived the shooting just 24 hours earlier.

articles.title: Wildfires Kill at Least 5 Trapped in Cars in Northern California
articles.description: The victims were trapped in their cars, officials said as wildfires rages in both Southern and Northern California. Hundreds of buildings have burned.
articles.content: The so-called Camp fire has burned 70,000 acres and is only 5 percent controlled, authorities said. Firefighters in Chico to the west of Paradise were lined up on the outskirts of the city on Friday morning to try to push the fire away from homes and subdivis… [+780 chars]
